TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ShutdownEventHandler(object sender, EventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed ShutdownEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: A <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
Docs.summary: Represents the method that will handle the event.

remarks.format:
## Remarks In Visual Basic, you do not need to work with this delegate explicitly. For more information, see <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.Shutdown>.
## Examples <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.Shutdown?displayProperty=fullName>
